DOC.HEADLINE: IN BRIEF ; LECTURE TO RECOUNT SKIERS ' HEROIC EXPLOITS
DOC.TEXT: The actions of Norwegian skiers who prevented Adolf Hitler from developing an atomic_bomb will be chronicled in " Skis Against the Bomb " on Wednesday at 7 p.m. at the Mark Taper Auditorium of the Central Library , at 5th and Flower streets in Downtown Los Angeles . The free lecture and slide show will be presented by Trond Woxen , a theater director , writer and former nuclear / biological / chemical_warfare specialist in the Norwegian army . Woxen will discuss the adventure of the team who skied to the remote Norsk Hydro Plant in Rjukan , Norway , and blew_up the facility , being used by Hitler to develop an atomic_bomb during World_War_II . For more information , call Louise Steinman at ( 213 ) 228-7472 .
